biotools.summary: GenTB is a user-friendly genome-based predictor for tuberculosis resistance powered by machine learning. genTB is an analysis tool for Mycobacterium tuberculosis genomic data that offers three main features: a means for sharing, citing and crediting TB data and metadata, the prediction of resistance on genotype using a machine learning algorithm, and geographic resistance and mutation data mapping.

bioschemas.name: GenTB
